name: governmentally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves government or the government: Politically and governmentally, the state has changed a lot. All publications were governmentally controlled. Related word
governmental
More examplesFewer examplesThere may be preferences for expenditure that is individually determined as opposed to governmentally determined.Is the area subject to natural disasters (indicated by governmentally declared emergencies)?These organizations are not governmentally subsidized.Information comes from the governmentally controlled media.They are competing with suppliers that are governmentally owned or subsidized.Many factors may be relevant here, including governmentally imposed constraints.
